summary: Cowboy and Indian's only wish was to come up with a brilliant idea for Mr Horse's birthday, but when their plan ends up in utter disaster, they'll need to travel the world and back to make things right again.
cast: Stéphane Aubier|Jeanne Balibar|Nicolas Buysse|François De Brigode|Véronique Dumont|Bruce Ellison|Christine Grulois|Frédéric Jannin|Bouli Lanners|Christelle Mahy|Eric Muller|François Neycken|Vincent Patar|Pipou|Franco Piscopo|Benoît Poelvoorde|David Ricci|Ben Tesseur|Alexandre von Sivers|David Holt|Brian Lykke
keywords: brick|horse|cowboy|cowboy and indian|animal that acts human
title: Pánico en la granja
